amendment.description: Amendment sought to require that organizations offering religious services or activities, do so separately from programs that use Community Services Block Grant funds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to insert provisions relating to the limitation on the use of funds and voluntariness.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 233 (Roll no. 16).
